q: You have 5 apples and give 2 away. How many left?
A toy costs $4. You have $10. How much change?
You have 3 friends and 12 candies to share equally. How many each?
A bus has 10 seats, 7 are taken. How many free?
You read 2 books a week. How many in 4 weeks?
A cake is cut into 8 pieces. You eat 3. How many left?
You have $15 and spend $9. How much left?
A team has 6 players. 2 more join. How many now?
You have 20 stickers and give half away. How many left?
A movie is 2 hours. You watch half. How long watched?
You have 9 pencils and lose 4. How many left?
A store has 15 toys. 6 are sold. How many left?
You walk 3 miles a day. How many in 5 days?
A pizza has 8 slices. You eat 2. How many left?
You save $2 a week. How much in 6 weeks?
A bag has 10 marbles. You take 3. How many left?
You have 7 cookies and share with 2 friends equally. How many each?
A game lasts 30 minutes. You play twice. How long total?
You have $20 and buy a $7 book. How much left?
A class has 25 students. 10 leave. How many stay?
You plant 4 seeds a day. How many in 3 days?
A rope is 10 feet. You cut 4 feet. How much left?
You have 12 eggs and use 5. How many left?
A trip takes 3 hours. You stop for 1 hour. Total time?
You have 18 coins and lose 7. How many left?
A shelf has 9 books. You add 3. How many now?
You run 2 miles a day. How many in 7 days?
A jar has 16 candies. You take 5. How many left?
You have $30 and spend $12. How much left?
A party needs 4 chairs per table. 3 tables. How many chairs?
